title: Buying or trading. Wanted T206 F.F. Baker stamped backs
author: 2dueces

posts.post_title: Buying or trading. Wanted T206 F.F. Baker stamped backs
posts.post_content: Title says it all. Willing to trade or buy Baker stamped backs. I have a collection of T206's and willing to trade your stamped back for one of my clean back T206's + a little diffence in price of course. If you have a SL and I have the same we may be able to haggle. Willing to buy the cards out right also. I know some board members have some and there are others out there. I plan on tracking down a relative and donating them for their family history. Thanks for looking. Joe

Tyler, sorry I did not include my email in my last reply to you. Here it is for anyone that has a Baker. 

[url]twodueces22@yahoo.com[/url]

Joe,
I did send two emails yesterday with pic's.  I just resent them.  Let me know if you do not receive them.
Thanks,
Tyler
I'm just going to bump this once. I'm sure everyone has seen it but there might be a few new lurkers that missed it as it went to the back page.
Still looking for F.F.Baker stamps. Will trade or buy. Thanks again

I sold a Steinfeldt American Beauty(no border) with the FF Baker stamp a few years ago and know that the buyer still owns it.  I'll see if he's willing to part with it.

Eric

Thanks Eric! I know someone just bought an Easterly with a Baker stamp. I'm willing to trade a nice T206 without any marks for that card. If you are the buyer I'm sure we could come to an agreement. I'm trying to amass as many Bakers and donate them to the Baker family as part of their family history. I have 10 so far. 

[url]twodueces22@yahoo.com[/url]

Received another FF Baker back because of this post so I am returning it to the top once again. I guess people still read these want lists every couple of weeks. If anyone is tired of me bumping this to the top please let me know and I will stop. My collection of Baker stamped backs stands at 11.
Joe, I sent you a PM...
Received another baker stamp thanks to this post and a fellow board member. TY guys and keep looking for me. :)
